text:
[Verse]
Lights are low night's begun
Under moon we come undone
Feet on fire hearts ignite
In the shadows we take flight

[Verse 2]
City pulse rhythm's beat
Every step move so sweet
Silhouettes in neon glow
Dancing shadows steal the show

[Chorus]
Oh we move like waves at sea
In this moment we're so free
Dancing shadows in the night
Feel the thrill so pure so right

[Verse 3]
Silent whispers in the air
Music lifts us from despair
Twist and turn with every sound
In this place we are unbound

[Bridge]
Hands up high touch the sky
Feel the magic passing by
Every beat is like a spark
Guiding us out of the dark

[Chorus]
Oh we move like waves at sea
In this moment we're so free
Dancing shadows in the night
Feel the thrill so pure so right
title: Dancing Shadows
